title: Commission Directive 89/2/EEC of 15 December 1988 amending Council Directive 66/402/EEC on the marketing of cereal seed
header:
COMMISSION  DIRECTIVE
of 15 December 1988
amending Council Directive 66/402/EEC on the marketing of cereal seed
(89/2/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
Member States shall bring into force the laws, regulations and administrative provisions necessary to comply with this Directive not later than 1 July 1990.
They shall forthwith inform the Commission thereof.
This Directive is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 December 1988.
For the Commission
Frans ANDRIESSEN
Vice-President
(1) OJ No 125, 11. 7. 1966, p. 2309/66.
(2) OJ No L 274, 6. 10. 1988, p. 44.
(3) OJ No L 187, 16. 7. 1988, p. 31.
